Class QuizResults

  • java.lang.Object
    • QuizResults

  •  class QuizResults
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds Quiz Result data for all Quiz Results.
    Version:
    2.0, June 10 2013
    Author:
    Richard shi

      • SaveQuizResult

        public void SaveQuizResult()
        Saves the current list of quizResult into the XML file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of QuizResults File.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        marshaller: Reference variable for Marshaller. Reads in data from a QuizResults class and saves it to the XML file.

        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.

      • LoadQuizResults

        public void LoadQuizResults()
        Loads the current quizResults from file.

        Local Variable Dictionary

        file: Reference variable for File. Holds File representation of QuizResults file.

        jc: Reference variable for JAXBContext. Provides a way to access XML binding methods.

        unmarshaller: Reference variable for Unmarshaller. Reads in data from a QuizResults XML file and loads it into a QuizResults class.

        quizResults: Reference Variable for QuizResults. Holds class to load data into.

        Throws:
        javax.xml.bind.JAXBException - XML marshalling failure.

      • getQuizResultsHtml

        public java.lang.String getQuizResultsHtml()
        Gets the QuizResults formatted into Html Data.

        Local Variable dictionary:

        htmlResult: Reference variable for String. Holds the Html Data

        q: Reference Variable for QuizResult. Temporarily holds All quizResult classes.

        Returns:
        htmlResult

        public void clearAll()
        Clears QuizResults of all QuizResult Classes.

      • addUserQuizResult

        public void addUserQuizResult(java.lang.String userId,
                     java.lang.String lessonId,
                     java.util.Date dateTaken,
                     java.lang.Float score)
        Adds a quizResult to the QuizResult List

        Local Variable Dictionary

        i: For loop variable.

        Parameters:
        userId - String to set UserID of.
        lessonId - String to set LessonID of.
        dateTaken - Date to set date of.
        score - Float to set score of.

      • addUserQuizResult

        lessonId - String to set LessonID of.

      • hasQuizBeenTaken

        public boolean hasQuizBeenTaken(java.lang.String userId,
                       java.lang.String lessonId)
        Checks if the Quiz has been taken before.
        Parameters:
        userId - String userId to check.
        lessonId - String LessonId to check.
        Returns:
